page.title: 06BAYSTON HILL GIRLS' GAMES
page.content:
Tick:_ One person is on and has to touch someone else then they are on. Everyone has to avoid being touched.
Skipping:_ Two girls twirl the rope around and, in turn, others jump into the rope and jump up every time it comes under their feet.They count the number of jumps until the rope catches them.
French Skipping:_ A long piece of elastic is held just above ground level by two girls.The elastic passes around their ankles.Someone jumps in and chants "In,out,in,on,out,together, in,out." Complicated criss-cross patterns are made in the elastic and then have to be undone.The person then jumps out.
